subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The details of a 1986 charity game between the Mets and the Red Sox are long forgotten, except for this: in the fourth inning, Bill Buckner booted a ground ball setting up the Mets’ first run.
snippet: The details of a 1986 charity game between the Mets and the Red Sox are long forgotten, except for this: in the fourth inning, Bill Buckner booted a ground ball setting up the Mets’ first run.
